alert.note: Alert for Meade; Seward (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 6:49PM CDT until July 07 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Seward County in southwestern Kansas... Southern Meade County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 648 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Forgan, or 13 miles southwest of Meade State Park, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Seward and southern Meade Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
